sources.title: Crossfire | Full Movie | Action Thriller
sources.description:
Crossfire - After a former FBI agentâ€™s wife is killed by a member of an organized crime syndicate, he learns that they are targeting his daughter and will stop at nothing to get to her. The killer gets closer, always seemingly one step ahead, and the father and daughter must prepare for the final showdown to protect everything and everyone that they love.
2023.  Stars: Louis Mandylor, Kevin Gage, Lori Pelenise Tuisano

sources.title: Crossfire (1947)
sources.description: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of demobilized soldiers he met in a bar. But which one? And why?

sources.title: Crossfire (1947) Robert Young Â· Robert Mitchum
sources.description: Socially critical post-war crime thriller with Robert Mitchum.

metadata.Plot: Homicide Capt. Finlay finds evidence that one or more of a group of demobilized soldiers is involved in the death of Joseph Samuels. In flashbacks, we see the night's events from different viewpoints as army Sgt. Keeley investigates on his own, trying to clear Mitchell, to whom circumstantial evidence points. Then the real, ugly motive for the killing begins to dawn on both Finlay and Keeley.
metadata.Actors: Robert Young, Robert Mitchum, Robert Ryan
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. 7 wins & 8 nominations total
